example.name: good exercise
example.text: I-1 was able *-1 to transition from one exercise to another very seamlessly.

example.name: Example with all but arg 0
example.text: the transition from a small start-up company to a marketing giant with sales last year of $ 1.79 billion
example.arg: to a marketing giant with sales last year of $ 1.79 billion

example.name: When to use arg 1 rather than arg 0
example.text: USX 's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil

example.name: When to use arg 0
example.text: The country's transition of it's government from a dictatorship to a democracy
